TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonLoadImageEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要加载`ImageName`由控件的属性标识的图像, 请处理事件。Handle the event if you want to load an image that is identified by the `ImageName` property of a control. 仅当显示功能区时, Microsoft Office 应用程序从你的解决方案中检索此图像, 以便提高性能。The Microsoft Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, when the Ribbon is displayed, to improve performance. 之后, 无法更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed. 若要为控件加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load an image for a control, add code to the event handler. `ImageName`如果的 属性与控件的属性匹配, 则将属性设置为要加载的图像。If the property of the matches the `ImageName` property of the control, set the property to the image that you want to load. ## Examples 下面的示例将缓存两个控件的图像。The following example caches the images for two controls. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个图像添加到项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置想要加载的功能区控件的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image of a Ribbon control that you want to load.

value.span: 以下表示你要加载的图像的对象之一: 、 IPictureDisp实现或指定内置 Office 图标的imageMso值的字符串中。

span.span: One of the following objects that represents the image that you want to load: an , an IPictureDisp implementation, or a string that specifies the imageMso value of a built-in Office icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件的事件处理程序中使用此属性来加载控件的图像。Use this property in the event handler for the event to load an image for a control. `ImageName`如果的 属性与控件的属性匹配, 则将属性设置为要加载的图像。If the property of the matches the `ImageName` property of the control, set the property to the image that you want to load. 若要缓存自定义图像, 请将此属性设置为`IPictureDisp`表示图像的或。To cache a custom image, set this property to an or an `IPictureDisp` that represents the image. 有关`IPictureDisp` COM 接口的详细信息, 请参阅[IPictureDisp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/42efa5a3-66af-4432-a2fd-616261b1f407)。For more information about the `IPictureDisp` COM interface, see [IPictureDisp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/42efa5a3-66af-4432-a2fd-616261b1f407). 若要缓存内置图标, 请将此属性设置为`imageMso`该图标的值。To cache a built-in icon, set this property to the `imageMso` value of the icon. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760).

summary.span: 获取功能区中正在加载的图像的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the image that is being loaded in the Ribbon.

value.span: 功能区中正在加载的图像的名称。

span.span: The name of the image that is being loaded in the Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件的事件处理程序中使用此属性来加载控件的图像。Use this property in the event handler for the event to load an image for a control. `ImageName`如果的 属性与控件的属性匹配, 则将属性设置为要加载的图像。If the property of the matches the `ImageName` property of the control, set the property to the image that you want to load.
